articles.author: Chris Welch
articles.title: Sonos announces the “breakthrough” Arc Ultra soundbar and Sub 4 - The Verge
articles.description: The new $999 Sonos Arc Ultra offers even more immersive and more powerful audio than the original Arc thanks to the inclusion of the company’s Sound Motion technology.
articles.content:

articles.title: Artificial Intelligence Raises Ukrainian Drone Kill Rates to 80% - Kyiv Post
articles.description: Ukraine has been called the “test lab for the future of war” nowhere more so than in the development of the technology and military use of drones, with a million UAVs to be fielded this year.
